verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> ye Jehovah<WH3050>. Praise<WH1984> ye the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3050>; Praise<WH1984> him<WH5650>, O ye servants of Jehovah<WH3068>,
Ye that stand<WH5975> in the house<WH1004> of Jehovah<WH3068>, In the courts<WH2691> of the house<WH1004> of our God<WH430>.
Praise <WH1984> ye Jehovah<WH3050>; For Jehovah<WH3050> is good<WH2896>: Sing praises<WH2167> unto his name<WH8034>; For it is pleasant<WH5273>.
For Jehovah<WH3050> hath chosen<WH977> Jacob<WH3290> unto himself<WH3478>, And Israel for his own possession<WH5459>.
For I know<WH3045> that Jehovah<WH3068> is great<WH1419>, And that our Lord<WH3068> is above all gods<WH430>.
Whatsoever Jehovah<WH3068> pleased<WH2654>, that hath he done<WH6213>, In heaven<WH8064> and in earth<WH776>, in the seas<WH3220> and in all deeps<WH8415>;

Who causeth the vapors<WH5387> to ascend<WH5927> from the ends<WH7097> of the earth<WH776>; Who maketh<WH6213> lightnings<WH1300> for the rain<WH4306>; Who bringeth<WH3318> forth the wind<WH7307> out of his treasuries<WH214>;
Who smote<WH5221> the first-born<WH1060> of Egypt<WH4714>, Both of man<WH120> and beast<WH929>;
Who sent<WH7971> signs<WH226> and wonders<WH4159> into the midst<WH8432> of thee<WH4714>, O Egypt, Upon Pharaoh<WH6547>, and upon all his servants<WH5650>;
Who smote<WH5221> many<WH7227> nations<WH1471>, And slew<WH2026> mighty<WH6099> kings<WH4428>,
Sihon <WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>, And Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan<WH1316>, And all the kingdoms<WH4467> of Canaan<WH3667>,
And gave<WH5414> their land<WH776> for a heritage<WH5159>, A heritage<WH5159> unto Israel<WH3478> his people<WH5971>.
Thy name<WH8034>, O Jehovah<WH3068>, endureth for ever<WH5769>; Thy memorial<WH2143> name<WH3068>, O Jehovah, throughout all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>.
For Jehovah<WH3068> will judge<WH1777> his people<WH5971>, And repent<WH5162> himself concerning his servants<WH5650>.
The idols<WH6091> of the nations<WH1471> are silver<WH3701> and gold<WH2091>, The work<WH4639> of men<WH120>'s hands<WH3027>.
They have mouths<WH6310>, but they speak<WH1696> not<WH5869>; Eyes have they<WH7200>, but they see not;
They have ears<WH241>, but they hear<WH238> not<WH3426>; Neither is there any breath<WH7307> in their mouths<WH6310>.
They that make<WH6213> them shall be like unto them<WH982>; Yea, every one that trusteth in them.
O house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, bless<WH1288> ye Jehovah<WH3068>: O house<WH1004> of Aaron<WH175>, bless<WH1288> ye Jehovah<WH3068>:
O house<WH1004> of Levi<WH3878>, bless<WH1288> ye Jehovah<WH3068>: Ye that fear<WH3373> Jehovah<WH3068>, bless<WH1288> ye Jehovah<WH3068>.
Blessed <WH1288> be Jehovah<WH3068> out of Zion<WH6726>, Who dwelleth<WH7931> at Jerusalem<WH3389>. Praise<WH1984> ye Jehovah<WH3050>.
